Package icyllis.arc3d.shaderc

Record Class Layout

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
icyllis.arc3d.shaderc.Layout
Record Components:
location - (in / out, expect for compute) individual variable, interface block, block member
component - (in / out, expect for compute) individual variable, block member
index - (fragment out) individual variable
binding - (UBO / SSBO) individual variable (opaque types only), interface block
offset - (UBO / SSBO) individual variable (atomic counters only), block member
align - (UBO / SSBO) interface block, block member
set - (UBO / SSBO, Vulkan only) individual variable (opaque types only), interface block
inputAttachmentIndex - (UBO, Vulkan only) individual variable (subpass types only), connect a shader variable to the corresponding attachment on the subpass in which the shader is being used
builtin - (SpvBuiltIn) identify which particular built-in value this object represents
public record Layout(int flags, int location, int component, int index, int binding, int offset, int align, int set, int inputAttachmentIndex, int builtin) extends Record
Represents a layout block appearing before a variable declaration, as in:

layout (location = 0) int x;

    • Layout

      public Layout(int flags, int location, int component, int index, int binding, int offset, int align, int set, int inputAttachmentIndex, int builtin)
      Creates an instance of a Layout record class.
      Parameters:
      flags - the value for the flags record component
      location - the value for the location record component
      component - the value for the component record component
      index - the value for the index record component
      binding - the value for the binding record component
      offset - the value for the offset record component
      align - the value for the align record component
      set - the value for the set record component
      inputAttachmentIndex - the value for the inputAttachmentIndex record component
      builtin - the value for the builtin record component

    • equals

      public final boolean equals(Object o)
      Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this one. The objects are equal if the other object is of the same class and if all the record components are equal. All components in this record class are compared with '=='.
      Specified by:
      equals in class Record
      Parameters:
      o - the object with which to compare
      Returns:
      true if this object is the same as the o argument; false otherwise.
